SEARCH
Package emissary.directory

Class EmissaryNode

java.lang.Object
emissary.directory.EmissaryNode
public class EmissaryNode extends Object
Hold some details about being a P2P node in the emissary network The order of preference to find the node configuration for an emissary node is
  1. node-[emissary.node.name]-[emissary.node.port].cfg
  2. node-[emissary.node.name].cfg
  3. node-[emissary.node.port].cfg
  4. node-[os-type].cfg
  5. node.cfg

  • Constructor Details

    • EmissaryNode

      public EmissaryNode()
      Construct the node. The node name and port are from system properties. The node type is based on the os.name in this implementation
